attributes.action: reduce energy wastage due to industrial/office building that leave majority of light switched on after work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While driving to London about 11pm arriving to Dockland. I notice that tall building (Bank offices) alway left thier light 'on' glowing very brightly all night. This is very energy wasting and not needed. I often seen some office tend to leave light on at various places.
